member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a new order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderDto.CustomerName
member.summary: Name of the customer related to the order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderDto.Discount
member.summary: Discount applied to the order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderDto.Taxes
member.summary: Taxes applied to the order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderDto.Items
member.summary: List of items that compose the order.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a new order item.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemDto.OrderId
member.summary: Identifier of the order associated with this item.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemDto.ProductId
member.summary: Identifier of the product associated with this item.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemDto.Quantity
member.summary: Quantity of the product included in this order item.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemForOrderDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create an item as part of a new order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemForOrderDto.ProductId
member.summary: Identifier of the product associated with the order item.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateOrderItemForOrderDto.Quantity
member.summary: Quantity of the product in the order.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreatePaymentDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a payment for an existing order.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreatePaymentDto.OrderId
member.summary: Identifier of the order that will be paid.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreatePaymentDto.Method
member.summary: Payment method used to pay the order.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a new product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.Name
member.summary: Name of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.UnitPrice
member.summary: Unit price of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.StockQuantity
member.summary: Initial stock quantity of the product.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateProductDto.SupplierId
member.summary: Identifier of the supplier associated with the product.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateStockMovementDto
member.summary: Data transfer object used to create a new stock movement.

member.summary: Identifier of the product affected by this stock movement.

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateStockMovementDto.QuantityChange
member.summary: Quantity of items that will change in stock

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateStockMovementDto.Type
member.summary: Type of stock movement (ENTRY or EXIT).

member.name: P:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateStockMovementDto.OrderId
member.summary: Optional identifier of the order related to this stock movement.

member.name: T:SmartStock.Dtos.CreateSupplierDto

member.summary: Contact phone number of the supplier.

member.summary: New name for the product (optional).

member.summary: New supplier identifier for the product (optional).
